topic.title: Liu Xiaobo, a Chinese democracy activist, died during imprisonment.
topic.body:
Liu Xiaobo, a Chinese democracy activist and novel medalist, died during imprisonment.

Original link
>http://edition.cnn.com/2017/07/13/asia/liu-xiaobo-death-china/index.html
>https://mobile.nytimes.com/2017/07/13/world/asia/liu-xiaobo-dead.html?referer=https://www.google.com/
>https://m.cn.nytimes.com/china/20170713/liu-xiaobo-dies-at-61/?ref=nyt-zh-CN

Mirror(PDF)
>http://4lpha.one/dl/0B4-IAD91OrqMbHNhQkFOblZLMTQ
>https://suyongso.moe/s/vyqt95Tduc9GOyx

TL;DR
>Liu Xiaobo, a Chinese democracy activist got sentenced 13 years for sigining Charter 08 at 2009 
>He got cancer during imprisonment
>He required treatment outside of China, but party denied
>Eventually he died at Chinese hospital 

What do you think?

topic.title: Is traps/偽娘 banned in China?
topic.body:
What is traps/偽娘? : A guy or boy pretending to be kawaii anime girl, Sometimes sex with manly guys

I heard that gay content is being banned in China. 
So I want to ask: Is traps/偽娘 banned in china?
